summary: Average biomarker testing turnaround time is 12.3 days, with significant variation by testing method and cancer type. Reducing average TAT by 5 days could generate $220,000 in additional value.

financial_impact.math: $220,000/year = 5 day reduction in TAT × 85 patients × $520 per day in improved care value

clinical_impact.description: Reducing biomarker testing turnaround time enables faster treatment initiation and improves outcomes.

metrics.description: Reduction in time to treatment initiation
Overall survival benefit with faster treatment initiation
Improved quality of life with earlier treatment

peer_comparison.description: Top performing practices achieve an average turnaround time of 6.8 days compared to your 12.3 days through integrated pathology systems.

financial_impact.math: $286,000/year = 5.5 day reduction to match benchmark × 100 patients × $520 per day
